00027   class CommHeader {

00029   public:

00032 
00033     static const size_t FIXED_LENGTH = 36;
00034 
00035     static const uint16_t FLAGS_BIT_REQUEST          = 0x0001;
00036     static const uint16_t FLAGS_BIT_IGNORE_RESPONSE  = 0x0002;
00037     static const uint16_t FLAGS_BIT_URGENT           = 0x0004;
00038     static const uint16_t FLAGS_BIT_PAYLOAD_CHECKSUM = 0x8000;
00039

00041     static const uint16_t FLAGS_MASK_IGNORE_RESPONSE  = 0xFFFD;
00042     static const uint16_t FLAGS_MASK_URGENT           = 0xFFFB;
00043     static const uint16_t FLAGS_MASK_PAYLOAD_CHECKSUM = 0x7FFF;

00045     CommHeader()
00046       : version(1), header_len(FIXED_LENGTH), flags(0),
00047         header_checksum(0), id(0), gid(0), total_len(0),
00048         timeout_ms(0), payload_checksum(0), command(0) {  }
00049 
00050     CommHeader(uint64_t cmd, uint32_t timeout=0)
00051       : version(1), header_len(FIXED_LENGTH), flags(0),
00052         header_checksum(0), id(0), gid(0), total_len(0),
00053         timeout_ms(timeout), payload_checksum(0),
00054         command(cmd) {  }
00055 
00056     size_t fixed_length() const { return FIXED_LENGTH; }
00057     size_t encoded_length() const { return FIXED_LENGTH; }
00058     void encode(uint8_t **bufp);
00059     void decode(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp);
00060 
00061     void set_total_length(uint32_t len) { total_len = len; }
00062 
00063     void initialize_from_request_header(CommHeader &req_header) {
00064       flags = req_header.flags;
00065       id = req_header.id;
00066       gid = req_header.gid;
00067       command = req_header.command;
00068       total_len = 0;
00069     }
